author: mrmitch
title: One must be able to see outside !
review: This set was available 5 years ago or so through the Shop at Home catalog. It is a must for any fan who like to create from bulk bricks or buckets. One can never have enough windows when construction begings on a house or condo or hotel. I have only seen this set available in a few of the catalogs, so you must really look to catch it. Great set !

author: jof
title: Must have for town buildings
review:
You can't build houses without windows & doors.

So if you have a load of bulk standard bricks, you must have one of these so you can make realistic houses.

I got a couple of extra copies to give to my nephews/nieces, as these are the bits that don't often come with sets.

Only downside is that its not as good as the 'windows & doors pack it replaces'.  For those that don't remember the older set, it had opening plain glass doors (left & right) for shop entrances etc.
